content: this is a free pattern for the cutest blob-shaped frog for this pattern you will need -worsted weight yarn size 4 i used red heart super saver in frosty green for the body baby pink for the blush and black for the mouth but you can use whatever colors you prefer these are just the colors i had on hand -12mm safety eyes -polyester fiber fill -3 75mm crochet hook -yarn needle -scissors -stitch markers abbreviations magic_ring- magic_ring st- stitch single_crochet- single_crochet increase- increase single_crochet twice in one stitch chain- chain decrease- decrease single_crochet two stitches together fo- finish off
